data.name: Union Jack
data.description: The first to take the mantle of Union Jack, adventurer and British superspy James Montgomery Falsworth charges up his attacks to blast away his enemies.

starItems.name: Union Jack
starItems.description: The first to take the mantle of Union Jack, adventurer and British superspy James Montgomery Falsworth charges up his attacks to blast away his enemies.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect into a negative effect on the primary target

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect into a negative effect.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect into a negative effect.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage + flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect into a negative effect.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to primary target
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, flip <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects instead

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect into a negative effect.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, flip <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects instead.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

1.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to the primary target.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>40%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.
If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, repeat this attack once per <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color> Bonus Attacks.
Lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> for each additional attack.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, also apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, to primary target on each attack.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks

2.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to the primary target.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.
If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, repeat this attack once per <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color> Bonus Attacks.
Lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> for each additional attack.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, also apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, to primary target on each attack.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks

3.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to the primary target.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, also apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, to primary target on each attack.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to the primary target.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

5.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to the primary target.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.
If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, repeat this attack once per <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color> Bonus Attacks.
Lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> for each additional attack.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, also apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, to primary target on each attack.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks

6.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to the primary target.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.
If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, repeat this attack once per <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color> Bonus Attacks.
Lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> for each additional attack.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, also apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, to primary target on each attack.
6.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks

7.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the primary target.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>. If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, repeat this attack once per <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color> Bonus Attacks.
Lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> for each additional attack.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, also apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, to primary target on each attack.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>. If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, reduce Speed Bar of the target by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

For each <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, repeat this attack against a different adjacent target, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color> adjacent targets. Lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> for each additional attack.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>. If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, reduce Speed Bar of the target by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

For each <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, repeat this attack against a different adjacent target, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color> adjacent targets. Lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> for each additional attack.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>. If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, reduce Speed Bar of the target by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

For each <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, repeat this attack against a different adjacent target, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color> adjacent targets. Lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> for each additional attack.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>. If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, reduce Speed Bar of the target by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

For each <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, repeat this attack against a different adjacent target, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color> adjacent targets. Lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> for each additional attack.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>. If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, reduce Speed Bar of the target by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

For each <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, repeat this attack against a different adjacent target, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color> adjacent targets. Lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> for each additional attack.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>. If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, reduce Speed Bar of the target by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

For each <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, repeat this attack against a different adjacent target, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color> adjacent targets. Lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> for each additional attack.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, reduce Speed Bar of all targets by +<color=#86e619>20%</color>

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>. If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, reduce Speed Bar of the target by <color=#86e619>30%</color>.

For each <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, repeat this attack against a different adjacent target, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color> adjacent targets. Lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> for each additional attack.

1.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>6</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

At the end of any character's Turn, if this character does not have <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Gain <color=#86e619>6</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
 > If this character successfully gained <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
1.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Chance
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Chance

2.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>6</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

At the end of any character's Turn, if this character does not have <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Gain <color=#86e619>6</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Chance.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Chance.
2.nextUpgrade: At the end of any character's Turn, if this character successfully gained <color=#fff568>Charged</color> from this Passive ability, fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>30%</color>

3.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>6</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

At the end of any character's Turn, if this character does not have <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Gain <color=#86e619>6</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
 > If this character successfully gained <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turns.
 > If this character successfully gained <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>30%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Chance.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Chance.
3.nextUpgrade:
While this character has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Crit Chance and +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Crit Damage
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Crit Chance

4.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>6</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

At the end of any character's Turn, if this character does not have <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Gain <color=#86e619>6</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
 > If this character successfully gained <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
 > If this character successfully gained <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>30%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Chance.
While this character has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Crit Chance and +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Crit Damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Chance.
 > <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Crit Chance.
4.nextUpgrade: At the end of any character's Turn, if this character successfully gained <color=#fff568>Charged</color> from this Passive ability, apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies

5.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>6</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

At the end of any character's Turn, if this character does not have <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Gain <color=#86e619>6</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
 > If this character successfully gained <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies.
 > If this character successfully gained <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
 > If this character successfully gained <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>30%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Chance.
While this character has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Crit Chance and +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Crit Damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Chance.
 > <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Crit Chance.
